01890 /***** Kernel-userspace comm helpers *******/
01891 
01892 /* Get length of entire message, including header */
01893 int kuc_len(int payload_len)
01894 {
01895         return sizeof(struct kuc_hdr) + payload_len;
01896 }
01897 EXPORT_SYMBOL(kuc_len);
01898 
01899 /* Get a pointer to kuc header, given a ptr to the payload
01900  * @param p Pointer to payload area
01901  * @returns Pointer to kuc header
01902  */
01903 struct kuc_hdr * kuc_ptr(void *p)
01904 {
01905         struct kuc_hdr *lh = ((struct kuc_hdr *)p) - 1;
01906         LASSERT(lh->kuc_magic == KUC_MAGIC);
01907         return lh;
01908 }
01909 EXPORT_SYMBOL(kuc_ptr);
01910 
01911 /* Alloc space for a message, and fill in header
01912  * @return Pointer to payload area
01913  */
01914 void *kuc_alloc(int payload_len, int transport, int type)
01915 {
01916         struct kuc_hdr *lh;
01917         int len = kuc_len(payload_len);
01918 
01919         OBD_ALLOC(lh, len);
01920         if (lh == NULL)
01921                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01922 
01923         lh->kuc_magic = KUC_MAGIC;
01924         lh->kuc_transport = transport;
01925         lh->kuc_msgtype = type;
01926         lh->kuc_msglen = len;
01927 
01928         return (void *)(lh + 1);
01929 }
01930 EXPORT_SYMBOL(kuc_alloc);
01931 
01932 /* Takes pointer to payload area */
01933 inline void kuc_free(void *p, int payload_len)
01934 {
01935         struct kuc_hdr *lh = kuc_ptr(p);
01936         OBD_FREE(lh, kuc_len(payload_len));
01937 }
01938 EXPORT_SYMBOL(kuc_free);
01939 
01940 struct obd_request_slot_waiter {
01941         struct list_head        orsw_entry;
01942         wait_queue_head_t       orsw_waitq;
01943         bool                    orsw_signaled;
01944 };
01945 
01946 static bool obd_request_slot_avail(struct client_obd *cli,
01947                                    struct obd_request_slot_waiter *orsw)
01948 {
01949         bool avail;
01950 
01951         spin_lock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01952         avail = !!list_empty(&orsw->orsw_entry);
01953         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01954 
01955         return avail;
01956 };
01957 
01958 /*
01959  * For network flow control, the RPC sponsor needs to acquire a credit
01960  * before sending the RPC. The credits count for a connection is defined
01961  * by the "cl_max_rpcs_in_flight". If all the credits are occpuied, then
01962  * the subsequent RPC sponsors need to wait until others released their
01963  * credits, or the administrator increased the "cl_max_rpcs_in_flight".
01964  */
01965 int obd_get_request_slot(struct client_obd *cli)
01966 {
01967         struct obd_request_slot_waiter   orsw;
01968         struct l_wait_info               lwi;
01969         int                              rc;
01970 
01971         spin_lock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01972         if (cli->cl_r_in_flight < cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight) {
01973                 cli->cl_r_in_flight++;
01974                 spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01975                 return 0;
01976         }
01977 
01978         init_waitqueue_head(&orsw.orsw_waitq);
01979         list_add_tail(&orsw.orsw_entry, &cli->cl_loi_read_list);
01980         orsw.orsw_signaled = false;
01981         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01982 
01983         lwi = LWI_INTR(LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP, NULL);
01984         rc = l_wait_event(orsw.orsw_waitq,
01985                           obd_request_slot_avail(cli, &orsw) ||
01986                           orsw.orsw_signaled,
01987                           &lwi);
01988 
01989         /* Here, we must take the lock to avoid the on-stack 'orsw' to be
01990          * freed but other (such as obd_put_request_slot) is using it. */
01991         spin_lock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
01992         if (rc != 0) {
01993                 if (!orsw.orsw_signaled) {
01994                         if (list_empty(&orsw.orsw_entry))
01995                                 cli->cl_r_in_flight--;
01996                         else
01997                                 list_del(&orsw.orsw_entry);
01998                 }
01999         }
02000 
02001         if (orsw.orsw_signaled) {
02002                 LASSERT(list_empty(&orsw.orsw_entry));
02003 
02004                 rc = -EINTR;
02005         }
02006         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
02007 
02008         return rc;
02009 }
02010 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_get_request_slot);
02011 
02012 void obd_put_request_slot(struct client_obd *cli)
02013 {
02014         struct obd_request_slot_waiter *orsw;
02015 
02016         spin_lock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
02017         cli->cl_r_in_flight--;
02018 
02019         /* If there is free slot, wakeup the first waiter. */
02020         if (!list_empty(&cli->cl_loi_read_list) &&
02021             likely(cli->cl_r_in_flight < cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight)) {
02022                 orsw = list_entry(cli->cl_loi_read_list.next,
02023                                   struct obd_request_slot_waiter, orsw_entry);
02024                 list_del_init(&orsw->orsw_entry);
02025                 cli->cl_r_in_flight++;
02026                 wake_up(&orsw->orsw_waitq);
02027         }
02028         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
02029 }
02030 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_put_request_slot);
02031 
02032 __u32 obd_get_max_rpcs_in_flight(struct client_obd *cli)
02033 {
02034         return cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight;
02035 }
02036 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_get_max_rpcs_in_flight);
02037 
02038 int obd_set_max_rpcs_in_flight(struct client_obd *cli, __u32 max)
02039 {
02040         struct obd_request_slot_waiter *orsw;
02041         __u32                           old;
02042         int                             diff;
02043         int                             i;
02044         char                            *typ_name;
02045         int                             rc;
02046 
02047         if (max > OBD_MAX_RIF_MAX || max < 1)
02048                 return -ERANGE;
02049 
02050         typ_name = cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_type->typ_name;
02051         if (strcmp(typ_name, LUSTRE_MDC_NAME) == 0) {
02052                 /* adjust max_mod_rpcs_in_flight to ensure it is always
02053                  * strictly lower that max_rpcs_in_flight */
02054                 if (max < 2) {
02055                         CERROR("%s: cannot set max_rpcs_in_flight to 1 "
02056                                "because it must be higher than "
02057                                "max_mod_rpcs_in_flight value",
02058                                cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_name);
02059                         return -ERANGE;
02060                 }
02061                 if (max <= cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight) {
02062                         rc = obd_set_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight(cli, max - 1);
02063                         if (rc != 0)
02064                                 return rc;
02065                 }
02066         }
02067 
02068         spin_lock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
02069         old = cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight;
02070         cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight = max;
02071         diff = max - old;
02072 
02073         /* We increase the max_rpcs_in_flight, then wakeup some waiters. */
02074         for (i = 0; i < diff; i++) {
02075                 if (list_empty(&cli->cl_loi_read_list))
02076                         break;
02077 
02078                 orsw = list_entry(cli->cl_loi_read_list.next,
02079                                   struct obd_request_slot_waiter, orsw_entry);
02080                 list_del_init(&orsw->orsw_entry);
02081                 cli->cl_r_in_flight++;
02082                 wake_up(&orsw->orsw_waitq);
02083         }
02084         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_loi_list_lock);
02085 
02086         return 0;
02087 }
02088 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_set_max_rpcs_in_flight);
02089 
02090 __u16 obd_get_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight(struct client_obd *cli)
02091 {
02092         return cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight;
02093 }
02094 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_get_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight);
02095 
02096 int obd_set_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight(struct client_obd *cli, __u16 max)
02097 {
02098         struct obd_connect_data *ocd;
02099         __u16 maxmodrpcs;
02100         __u16 prev;
02101 
02102         if (max > OBD_MAX_RIF_MAX || max < 1)
02103                 return -ERANGE;
02104 
02105         /* cannot exceed or equal max_rpcs_in_flight */
02106         if (max >= cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight) {
02107                 CERROR("%s: can't set max_mod_rpcs_in_flight to a value (%hu) "
02108                        "higher or equal to max_rpcs_in_flight value (%u)\n",
02109                        cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_name,
02110                        max, cli->cl_max_rpcs_in_flight);
02111                 return -ERANGE;
02112         }
02113 
02114         /* cannot exceed max modify RPCs in flight supported by the server */
02115         ocd = &cli->cl_import->imp_connect_data;
02116         if (ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_MULTIMODRPCS)
02117                 maxmodrpcs = ocd->ocd_maxmodrpcs;
02118         else
02119                 maxmodrpcs = 1;
02120         if (max > maxmodrpcs) {
02121                 CERROR("%s: can't set max_mod_rpcs_in_flight to a value (%hu) "
02122                        "higher than max_mod_rpcs_per_client value (%hu) "
02123                        "returned by the server at connection\n",
02124                        cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_name,
02125                        max, maxmodrpcs);
02126                 return -ERANGE;
02127         }
02128 
02129         spin_lock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02130 
02131         prev = cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight;
02132         cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight = max;
02133 
02134         /* wakeup waiters if limit has been increased */
02135         if (cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight > prev)
02136                 wake_up(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_waitq);
02137 
02138         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02139 
02140         return 0;
02141 }
02142 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_set_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight);
02143 
02144 
02145 #define pct(a, b) (b ? a * 100 / b : 0)
02146 int obd_mod_rpc_stats_seq_show(struct client_obd *cli,
02147                                struct seq_file *seq)
02148 {
02149         struct timeval now;
02150         unsigned long mod_tot = 0, mod_cum;
02151         int i;
02152 
02153         do_gettimeofday(&now);
02154 
02155         spin_lock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02156 
02157         seq_printf(seq, "snapshot_time:         %lu.%lu (secs.usecs)\n",
02158                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
02159         seq_printf(seq, "modify_RPCs_in_flight:  %hu\n",
02160                    cli->cl_mod_rpcs_in_flight);
02161 
02162         seq_printf(seq, "\n\t\t\tmodify\n");
02163         seq_printf(seq, "rpcs in flight        rpcs   %% cum %%\n");
02164 
02165         mod_tot = lprocfs_oh_sum(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_hist);
02166 
02167         mod_cum = 0;
02168         for (i = 0; i < OBD_HIST_MAX; i++) {
02169                 unsigned long mod = cli->cl_mod_rpcs_hist.oh_buckets[i];
02170                 mod_cum += mod;
02171                 seq_printf(seq, "%d:\t\t%10lu %3lu %3lu\n",
02172                            i, mod, pct(mod, mod_tot),
02173                            pct(mod_cum, mod_tot));
02174                 if (mod_cum == mod_tot)
02175                         break;
02176         }
02177 
02178         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02179 
02180         return 0;
02181 }
02182 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_mod_rpc_stats_seq_show);
02183 #undef pct
02184 
02185 
02186 /* The number of modify RPCs sent in parallel is limited
02187  * because the server has a finite number of slots per client to
02188  * store request result and ensure reply reconstruction when needed.
02189  * On the client, this limit is stored in cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight
02190  * that takes into account server limit and cl_max_rpcs_in_flight
02191  * value.
02192  * On the MDC client, to avoid a potential deadlock (see Bugzilla 3462),
02193  * one close request is allowed above the maximum.
02194  */
02195 static inline bool obd_mod_rpc_slot_avail_locked(struct client_obd *cli,
02196                                                  bool close_req)
02197 {
02198         bool avail;
02199 
02200         /* A slot is available if
02201          * - number of modify RPCs in flight is less than the max
02202          * - it's a close RPC and no other close request is in flight
02203          */
02204         avail = cli->cl_mod_rpcs_in_flight < cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight ||
02205                 (close_req && cli->cl_close_rpcs_in_flight == 0);
02206 
02207         return avail;
02208 }
02209 
02210 static inline bool obd_mod_rpc_slot_avail(struct client_obd *cli,
02211                                          bool close_req)
02212 {
02213         bool avail;
02214 
02215         spin_lock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02216         avail = obd_mod_rpc_slot_avail_locked(cli, close_req);
02217         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02218         return avail;
02219 }
02220 
02221 /* Get a modify RPC slot from the obd client @cli according
02222  * to the kind of operation @opc that is going to be sent
02223  * and the intent @it of the operation if it applies.
02224  * If the maximum number of modify RPCs in flight is reached
02225  * the thread is put to sleep.
02226  * Returns the tag to be set in the request message. Tag 0
02227  * is reserved for non-modifying requests.
02228  */
02229 __u16 obd_get_mod_rpc_slot(struct client_obd *cli, __u32 opc,
02230                            struct lookup_intent *it)
02231 {
02232         struct l_wait_info      lwi = LWI_INTR(NULL, NULL);
02233         bool                    close_req = false;
02234         __u16                   i, max;
02235 
02236         /* read-only metadata RPCs don't consume a slot on MDT
02237          * for reply reconstruction
02238          */
02239         if (it != NULL && (it->it_op == IT_GETATTR || it->it_op == IT_LOOKUP ||
02240                            it->it_op == IT_LAYOUT || it->it_op == IT_READDIR))
02241                 return 0;
02242 
02243         if (opc == MDS_CLOSE)
02244                 close_req = true;
02245 
02246         do {
02247                 spin_lock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02248                 max = cli->cl_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight;
02249                 if (obd_mod_rpc_slot_avail_locked(cli, close_req)) {
02250                         /* there is a slot available */
02251                         cli->cl_mod_rpcs_in_flight++;
02252                         if (close_req)
02253                                 cli->cl_close_rpcs_in_flight++;
02254                         lprocfs_oh_tally(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_hist,
02255                                          cli->cl_mod_rpcs_in_flight);
02256                         /* find a free tag */
02257                         i = find_first_zero_bit(cli->cl_mod_tag_bitmap,
02258                                                 max + 1);
02259                         LASSERT(i < OBD_MAX_RIF_MAX);
02260                         LASSERT(!test_and_set_bit(i, cli->cl_mod_tag_bitmap));
02261                         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02262                         /* tag 0 is reserved for non-modify RPCs */
02263                         return i + 1;
02264                 }
02265                 spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02266 
02267                 CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "%s: sleeping for a modify RPC slot "
02268                        "opc %u, max %hu\n",
02269                        cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_name, opc, max);
02270 
02271                 l_wait_event(cli->cl_mod_rpcs_waitq,
02272                              obd_mod_rpc_slot_avail(cli, close_req), &lwi);
02273         } while (true);
02274 }
02275 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_get_mod_rpc_slot);
02276 
02277 /* Put a modify RPC slot from the obd client @cli according
02278  * to the kind of operation @opc that has been sent and the
02279  * intent @it of the operation if it applies.
02280  */
02281 void obd_put_mod_rpc_slot(struct client_obd *cli, __u32 opc,
02282                           struct lookup_intent *it, __u16 tag)
02283 {
02284         bool                    close_req = false;
02285 
02286         if (it != NULL && (it->it_op == IT_GETATTR || it->it_op == IT_LOOKUP ||
02287                            it->it_op == IT_LAYOUT || it->it_op == IT_READDIR))
02288                 return;
02289 
02290         if (opc == MDS_CLOSE)
02291                 close_req = true;
02292 
02293         spin_lock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02294         cli->cl_mod_rpcs_in_flight--;
02295         if (close_req)
02296                 cli->cl_close_rpcs_in_flight--;
02297         /* release the tag in the bitmap */
02298         LASSERT(tag - 1 < OBD_MAX_RIF_MAX);
02299         LASSERT(test_and_clear_bit(tag - 1, cli->cl_mod_tag_bitmap) != 0);
02300         spin_unlock(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_lock);
02301         wake_up(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_waitq);
02302 }
02303 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obd_put_mod_rpc_slot);
02304
